Hello World! My name is

SenSaïtional Laboratory

Welcome to the SenSaitional Laboratory—a curated archive of my personal and collaborative projects. Here, you’ll trace the evolution of my skills, from humble beginnings to more refined creations. It all starts with my very first portfolio website, a stepping stone that sparked my ongoing journey. Explore each endeavor to see how my passion and expertise grow with every project I undertake.

About

My name is Saï, a college student with a passion for carving my own path in the constantly evolving world of technology. While my formal education has given me a solid foundation, I’ve decided to supplement my studies by creating personal projects and learning on my own—an approach I believe will lead me to a more fulfilling and up-to-date career.


This project is my very first fully completed and publicly launched endeavor, marking a significant milestone on my journey. I’ve kept it intentionally modest, aiming to showcase my current, unfiltered coding abilities rather than attempting something overly complex. In time, I plan to expand and refine my skills by taking on more ambitious projects, each one reflecting the growth of my knowledge and creativity. Until then, this initial project stands as my stepping stone—a humble beginning, but one that highlights my commitment to learning, pushing boundaries, and continually improving.

My Projects

A quick look into some of the projects I’ve been working on, each showcasing different skills and approaches.

Portfolio Website #1

My first ever fully completed portfolio template website, built using raw HTML, the Tailwind CSS framework, and React for small functionalities.
